name: Project Outland
description:
Project Outland is an exploration game focused around the audio style of our musician Benjamin Napier. Traverse through the alien landscape presented to you, with tree bouncing and vibrating to the beat of the music. Toggle the individual music pieces using your keyboard, and soar through the skies and witness the environmment.

Windows build is having issues uploading, Mac build to come.

Thanks to Zac Croslow, Benjamin Napier, Philip Alexander Orr, Alex Luthe, Joshua Irish-donges, Ewan Winter, Sophia Ranger and Ryan Butt.
